name: MacBook Pro 2021 Memoji Creator
description:
To get your Memoji from your iPhone, you can


A) Go to Notes, insert a Memoji sticker, hold press the Memoji sticker, then tap on Share and then onto Save Image.


B) Go to iMessage, then tap on Animoji or Memoji, and then tap on the ••• icon and screenshot your best pose.


C) Same way as option B, but after tapping ••• tap on Edit (this is a slightly bigger size).


Suggestions? Let me know! @emrhnugrl on Twitter.


-


Inspired by iMac Memoji Profile Picture by Emir Saldierna.
